marathon.name: Marathon
marathon.description: Visit all locations in one raid as a PMC (Ground Zero, Streets of Tarkov, The Lab, Interchange, Customs, Factory, Woods, Reserve, Lighthouse, Shoreline) Note: Starting on Ground Zero and ending on Shoreline is required complete this achievement.
